testimonials.author: @beyaangobung
testimonials.review: 100% top quality crystals. I love how they interact with their followers and make sure that they get the best experience when picking out their crystals.

testimonials.author: @badgyaldesi
testimonials.review: Connie & Jacob have the best quality crystals!! They have affordable pricing by including bundles or gift sets. They also include shipping and have awesome customer service.

testimonials.author: @anniebanannie_16
testimonials.review: Beautiful crystals at an absolutely affordable price. Plus great customer service. Love love love crystalsbyus. ❤️
